snippet: Ms. Lowin’s show, “I Know You By Heart: the Songs of Eva Cassidy,” projected a similar aura as Ms. Cassidy while infusing a wistful authority into her lyrics.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews tribute concert to singer Eva Cassidy, performed by Rebekah Lowin, at Metropolitan Room.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Lowin’s show, “I Know You By Heart: the Songs of Eva Cassidy,” projected a similar aura as Ms. Cassidy while infusing a wistful authority into her lyrics.

headline.main: Review: In Tribute to Eva Cassidy, Rebekah Lowin Gives New Personality to Standards
headline.print_headline: Lending New Personality to a Familiar Portrait
